content: Note that I had to cancel the meeting tomorrow
@Aman Arora maybe we should schedule a different time to look at the closure size statistics
also, did you open an issue on the repo for the "if we capture all fields, just capture the local" optimization?

nikomatsakis said:

also, did you open an issue on the repo for the "if we capture all fields, just capture the local" optimization?

nikomatsakis said:

Aman Arora maybe we should schedule a different time to look at the closure size statistics

I think the compiler still has some issues with closure sizes. I ran into a bug last time and the new place doesn't seem to work.

we also probably should meet to discuss annotating stdlib with insignificant_dtors.

cc @Dhruv Jauhar
